item.title: Annotatable Webpages and Annotate Webpages
item.description: Hypothesis, an online annotation tool Recently, I learned a cool online annotation tool, Hypothesis, which lets webpage readers add, share, explore and save annotations online for free. What can Hypothesis do Annotate and post publicly or save privately. Reply to or share any annotation publicly. Collaborate privately within a group. Explore public annotations and profiles.
